page.title: 13ST.REGIS PACKAGING,ADELAIDE
page.content: St.Regis Packaging is situated on the Ely-Prickwillow road.It makes card board packaging for a variety of industrial and commercial uses.It is owned by an American company and employs 200 people.Only 30 of these are women,as are the nine office and factory cleaners.50% of the paper with which the cardboard boxes are made comes by ship from the parent company in America,20% from Scandinavia and the remaining 30% from Britain.The various grades of paper are processed using a corrugator machine which produces cardboard in sheet board form.The cardboard is then fed into a machine called an Armstitcher which staples it to the required shape and size.The main customers are Rothmans and Procter & Gamble but altogether the factory provides packaging for 1,300 firms.
